title: KENNY DIES

text: Alder Research Group, next day. Inside, employees are packing away their computers and other office equipment

title: KENNY DIES
text: This is where the bulk of our research was being done. But due to the government ban, we're mostly just packing things up.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Doctor, can you tell me exactly how stem cells work?

title: KENNY DIES
text: Look, you have trillions of cells in your body: heart cells, skin cells, brain cells, and so on. But before a cell is designated as a toenail cell or a pancreas cell, it's what we call a stem cell. Sort of like a black cell. Do you understand?

title: KENNY DIES
text: Not at all, but go on.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Because these cells are blanks, they will often program themselves based on what cells you put around them. You see this rat? Earlier this year, we surgically removed the middle of her spine. then we injected her with some stem cells and... they became the mising part of the spine.

title: KENNY DIES
text: My God...

title: KENNY DIES
text: Nerve cells damaged by Parkinson's disease or heart tissue of cardiac patients might ultimately be replaced by tissue grown from stem cells.

text: So then, could stem cells be used on someone whose muscle tissue is wasting away? Ihin other words, if a little boy was dying from a muscular disease, the stem cells could become new muscle tissue.

That's like God, who gives us life and love and help just so that he can tear it all away and make us cry, so he can drink the sweet milk of our tears. text: Planned Parenthood, day. Cartman, in shirt and tie, is outside with clipboard in hand, talking to a woman about to have an abortion.

title: KENNY DIES
text: And so you see, now that the ban on stem-cell research has been lifted, we can sell your fetus to compnaies like Alder Labs.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Oh, I don't know.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Look, I can offer you seventy-five dollars for that fetus right now, Jill.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Seventy-five dollars? Well, alright.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Great, just sign right here, please. Hi. Havin' an abortion today?  Great. Listen, if you'd like to sell your abortion for research I'm offering uh, seventy-five dollars. Help you out a little bit with your medical bill in there.  And you sign right here.  Uh excuse me, ma'am. Can I interest you in selling your aborted fetus?

title: KENNY DIES
text: We're not going to the abortion clinic. I'm going to have this baby.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that, because uh, there's a little boy dying in a hospital right now who sure could use that baby more than you could. The stem cells from your fetus could help save his life.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Oh. Well, I guess we can always... just make another one.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Oh Mark, I love you.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Alright! Now Kenny has a fighting chance.

title: KENNY DIES
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, day. Stan enters with a package, his faith renewed, his confidence strong, and makes his way down the hall, passing people as he goes

title: KENNY DIES
text: Young man, do you know where you're going?

title: KENNY DIES
text: Yeah. I'm gonna see my friend, because he needs me right now.

title: KENNY DIES
text: All right!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Go kid!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Good for you!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, Kenny's room. Stan enters happily

title: KENNY DIES
text: Hey, Kenny!  Oh no.  No.

title: KENNY DIES
text: He just... He just... stopped breathing. And it was over.

title: KENNY DIES
text: But...  I didn't get to see him. Hell I, I didn't get to sssay good-bye. Did he say anything before he went?

title: KENNY DIES
text: He just said... "Where's Stan?"

title: KENNY DIES
text: First Church of South Park,some days later, day. The camera looks up at some lights, then pans down as it back up to focus on the altar

title: KENNY DIES
text: And so, we will all miss Kenny, his playful laughter, his innocent smile. But we will never forget that it was because of brave Kenny that stem-cell research was allowed to continue.

title: KENNY DIES
text: I let Kenny down. I'm his worst f-f-f-friend.

title: KENNY DIES
text: You guys! Come quick!

title: KENNY DIES
text: What, Cartman

title: KENNY DIES
text: It's...  Why, it's a miracle, you guys!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Outside, day. Cartman stops, but still bounces from joy. Stan and Kyle join him

title: KENNY DIES
text: What, Cartman? What's happened?

title: KENNY DIES
text: Look.  I put the stem cells from all the fetuses I had next to a Shakey's, and they ARE replicating a new Shakey's! It worked!

title: KENNY DIES
text: This whole time, you were just using Kenny's illness to lift the ban on stem cell research so you could sell your stupid fetuses?

title: KENNY DIES
text: Stupid fetuses? It's my own Shakey's!

title: KENNY DIES
text: I actually hugged you. I held you in my arms and, and, cried with you.

title: KENNY DIES
text: I think I only need a hundred or so more aborted babies,  and I can finish up the kitchen.

title: KENNY DIES
text: AAARGH!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Aah! Kyle!  Kyle!

title: KENNY DIES
text: Hey, I wasn't Kenny's worst f-f-f-friend! Cartman was!
